Text: FW April Maintenance QuestionsDarrell Ben at Conoco would like to know the answers to the questions listed below His rd question below I think he means instead of Thanks Tracy Original Message From Schoene Ben J ENRON Sent Thursday March AM To Minter Tracy Subject April Maintenance Questions Tracy Can you please help me with the following What is the total capacity for the San Juan lateral What is the total capacity for the Mainline West of Thoreau On April the Ignacio to Blanco line is going from to with La Plata dropping through April When does the come back online Thank you Ben Benjamin James Schoene Transportation Analyst West Region Conoco Gas and Power Marketing No Dairy Ashford CH Houston TX Office Fax Mobile

FW LATE NIGHT NOTES Cc Original Message From Hernandez Bert Sent Wednesday March PM To Giambrone Laura McEvoy Christine Miller Beverly Miller Christopher L Minter Tracy Mulligan Amy Ward Linda Subject LATE NIGHT NOTES It seems like a lifetime ago but the system actually behaved itself and didnt invalidate points on contracts or stall during any of the processes ID No variances or manually scheduled items EVE Small variance at ANR due to problem with USGT at NNGHalley Transcolorado is off but I should be able to fix it on ID See you later Bert

RE pplnomxls Cc Who was going to put the nom in Original Message From Schoolcraft Darrell Sent Wednesday March AM To Minter Tracy Subject RE pplnomxls laura and amy and i told him he could have ds Original Message From Minter Tracy Sent Wednesday March AM To Schoolcraft Darrell Subject FW pplnomxls FYI See Davids note below about payback Let me know if I need to do anything for this payback to happen Tracy Original Message From ENRON Sent Wednesday March AM To Mulligan Amy Giambrone Laura Minter Tracy Subject pplnomxls Hi all Attached is PPLs gas nomination for tomorrow Please note we are requesting a payback from the OBA on the TW lateral per discussion with Citizens and TW gas control Thanks David pplnomxls File pplnomxls

FW pplnomxlsFYI See Davids note below about payback Let me know if I need to do anything for this payback to happen Tracy Original Message From ENRON Sent Wednesday March AM To Mulligan Amy Giambrone Laura Minter Tracy Subject pplnomxls Hi all Attached is PPLs gas nomination for tomorrow Please note we are requesting a payback from the OBA on the TW lateral per discussion with Citizens and TW gas control Thanks David pplnomxls

FW LATE NIGHT NOTES Cc Original Message From Hernandez Bert Sent Sunday March PM To Giambrone Laura McEvoy Christine Miller Beverly Miller Christopher L Minter Tracy Mulligan Amy Ward Linda Subject LATE NIGHT NOTES ID No variances or manually scheduled items The confirmation phase of the cycle got slightly stalled but not as long as last nights evening cycle EVENING No variances but I did manually schedule Sempras CRs and due to problem listed below OTHER Can someone review the allocations for for Conocos CR with Diane Diane seems to feel that she is being unfairly cut by our San Juan and WFSMilagro allocations I printed the ID allocations but did not get a chance to review Can someone review the critical notice posted on the internet for the LaPlata Compressor Station for April with Darrell The affected customer list shows Red Cedars points on the nd but not on the rd through th Kim Thomas with Red Cedar does not know if her points will or will not be affected Please call her tomorrow morning if possible to verify the posting Sempras CR was adjusted Friday to have Calpine be a primary delivery point for day however an error within CMS has kept the point as a secondary delivery and is being allocated by San Juan FMJ I have sent an email to Dennis but could someone followup with him to see that it gets fixed You may also have to touch the nom to have the change take effect in TMS Jim will ask probably to extend the change in primary points for a longer period of time since the Bisti compressor may be down for to weeks Since the Evening cycle did not complete in a timely manner I used preliminary numbers in Gaskit Please review the numbers with Williams after the NonGrid My Bruno may have to have surgery today for a torn ACL so I may be running a bit late for the late shift I will keep you informed Sorry for all the problems I am leaving for the day shift See you later Bert

RE TW shipper imbalancesI invoiced Aurora Natural Gas on Needs to be updated on the spreadsheet Thanks Original Message From Hanagriff Richard Sent Tuesday October PM To Blair Lynn Corman Shelley Lokay Michelle Watson Kimberly Lindberg Lorraine Schoolcraft Darrell Minter Tracy McEvoy Christine Mulligan Amy Giambrone Laura Hass Glen Dietz Rick Hernandez Bert Ward Linda Kowalke Terry Subject TW shipper imbalances Summary since Balance at Change due to scheduling Payments received Balance at See attached for detail File shipsummaryxls
